code:
-spec maximum_triplet_value(Nums :: [integer()]) -> integer().
maximum_triplet_value(Nums) ->
    find_max_triplet(Nums, 0).

%% Helper function to iterate over all triplets and find the maximum value.
find_max_triplet(Nums, MaxSoFar) ->
    find_max_triplet(Nums, MaxSoFar, 0, length(Nums)).

find_max_triplet(_, MaxSoFar, I, Length) when I >= Length - 2 ->
    %% Ensure the result is at least 0.
    max(0, MaxSoFar);
find_max_triplet(Nums, MaxSoFar, I, Length) ->
    find_max_triplet(Nums, find_max_j(Nums, MaxSoFar, I, I+1, Length), I+1, Length).

find_max_j(_, MaxSoFar, _, J, Length) when J >= Length - 1 ->
    MaxSoFar;
find_max_j(Nums, MaxSoFar, I, J, Length) ->
    find_max_j(Nums, find_max_k(Nums, MaxSoFar, I, J, J+1, Length), I, J+1, Length).

find_max_k(_, MaxSoFar, _, _, K, Length) when K >= Length ->
    MaxSoFar;
find_max_k(Nums, MaxSoFar, I, J, K, Length) ->
    IVal = lists:nth(I + 1, Nums),
    JVal = lists:nth(J + 1, Nums),
    KVal = lists:nth(K + 1, Nums),
    Val = (IVal - JVal) * KVal,
    NewMax = max(MaxSoFar, Val),
    find_max_k(Nums, NewMax, I, J, K+1, Length).
